# ai-image-generator

This library was generated with [Nx](https://nx.dev).

## Running unit tests

Run `nx test ai-image-generator` to execute the unit tests via [Jest](https://jestjs.io).

# DpButton

## Example

```tsx
import { DpButton } from '@js-monorepo/button'

export default function Example() {
  return <DpButton>Submit</DpButton>
}
```

## Properties

- variant?: `'primary' | 'secondary' | 'danger'` **_-- default: 'primary'_**
- size?: `'small' | 'medium' | 'large'` **_-- default: 'medium'_**
- className?: `string`
- children?: `React.ReactNode`
- loading?: `boolean` **_-- default: false_**

DpNextMap

a nextjs library ## Example ```jsx import { DpNextMap, DpMarker, DpPopup } from '@js-monorepo/map' export function Example() { return ( You are here ) } ```

# DpMarkdown

## Example

```jsx
import { DpMarkdown } from '@js-monorepo/markdown'
const markdownExample = `
    # Heading
    ## Sub heading
    - point
    some text
  `

export function Example() {
  return <DpMarkdown markdownCode={markdownExample}></DpMarkdown>
}
```

## Properties

- markdownCode: `string`
- className?: `string`

DpNextNavLink

a nextjs library ## Example ```jsx import { DpNextNavLink } from '@js-monorepo/nav-link' export function Example() { return example } ``` **_IMPORTANT_** If you want to use ``, then you must use ``

DpNextNavbar

a nextjs library ## Example ```jsx import { DpLogo, DpNextNavbar, UserNavSocial, } from '@js-monorepo/navbar' export function Example() { const socials: UserNavSocial[] = [ { type: 'github', onLogin: () => {}, }, { type: 'google', onLogin: () => {}, }, { type: 'facebook', onLogin: () => {}, }, ] const menuItems: MenuItem[] = [ { href: '/', name: 'Home', }, { href: '/about', name: 'About', }, ] return ( console.log('logged out')} > Next App ) } ``` ## Properties - children?: `ReactNode` - menuItems?: `MenuItem[]` - user?: `UserNavProps` - socialLogin?: `UserNavSocial[]` - onLogout?: () => `void`

DpNextPageProgressBar

a nextjs library ## Example ```jsx import { DpNextPageProgressBar } from '@js-monorepo/page-progress-bar' export function Example() { return {children} } ``` **_IMPORTANT_** If you want to use ``, then you must use `` ## Properties - children: `React.ReactNode` - color?: `string` - height?: `string` - options?: `Partial` - shallowRouting?: `boolean` - delay?: `number` - style?: `string`

DpNextSidebar

a nextjs library ## Example ```jsx import { DpNextSidebar, MenuItem } from '@js-monorepo/sidebar' export function Example() { const [openSideBar, setOpenSideBar] = useState(false) return ( setOpenSideBar(false)} position="right" items={menuItems} > ) } ``` ## Properties - children?: `ReactNode` - isOpen: `boolean` - onClose: () => `void` - position?: `SidebarPositionType` - items: `MenuItem[]` - header?: `string`
